item.title: Buzzy Books Your Patrons Are Hearing About
item.description: Library workers should prepare for patrons coming in looking for these buzzy books that are getting a ton of press coverage.

item.title: 6 YA Romantasy Reads for Romance Lovers
item.description: These YA romantasy books make their love stories the priority, which makes them perfect for teen and adult romance readers.

item.title: Reality Bites: 11 Awesome New Sci-Fi and Fantasy Books of November 2025
item.description: Beat the reality blues with this selection of awesome new sci-fi and fantasy reads out in November.

item.title: Get Ready for These Thrillifying Adaptations Coming Out in November
item.description: From Wicked: For Good to Hamnet to All Her Fault, here are the book-to-screen adaptations out in November 2025 worth watching.

item.title: 10 of the Best New Books of November in Every Genre
item.description: From literary fiction to horror, nonfiction, romance, and more, here are ten of the most exciting new books out in November 2025.
